outcome: An encrypted map suggests foreign cyber-espionage targeting the BCI.

events.description: A new task force forms to investigate anomalies within the BCI system, leveraging cybersecurity experts and insiders.
Encrypted map discovered, hinting at external targeting by foreign cyber-espionage actors, prompts high-level meeting.
Government acknowledges potential foreign threat; speeches emphasize unity and resilience.
National drills conducted to test response to cyber-threats, building public awareness of technological vulnerabilities.
